title: Struct Manipulation in Go
description: This lab aims to test your knowledge of Go's structs, which are typed collections of fields. Structs are useful for grouping data together to form records.

meta.title: Mastering Struct Manipulation in Go
meta.description: Dive into the world of Go's structs and learn how to create, manipulate, and utilize them effectively.
meta.keywords: data structures, software development, go, go labs, go playground online, structs, programming, go lab, go practice

verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go 语言中的结构体操作
i18n.description: 本实验旨在测试你对 Go 语言结构体的了解，结构体是一种字段的类型化集合。结构体对于将数据组合在一起形成记录很有用。

meta.title: 精通 Go 语言中的结构体操作
meta.description: 深入 Go 语言结构体的世界，学习如何有效地创建、操作和使用它们。

meta.description: Sumérgete en el mundo de los structs de Go y aprende cómo crearlos, manipularlos y utilizarlos de manera efectiva.
